name: 3D Safe Platformer
description:
My submission for the BringOutYourDead jam. This isn't a finished game!

I worked on a 3D platformer for a while where you play as a cute and cool little safe, jumping over pits and dodging spike balls in a huge tower in order to find out what's inside your own locked door.

Controls: WSAD to move and space to jump w/ keyboard, and left stick to move and a-button to jump with a controller.

There are two levels, the Foyer and the Library (which isn't finished). None of which have any real art in them. There are large cuboids around that act as checkpoints; they'll turn blue when you activate one. There are also pennies that can be collected, doors that you can enter but aren't animated and a few enemies.

I made this alone, and it started to die out as the modelling and art side of things became too much for just me. I would love to come back to this, it's a cool idea and plays quite well. Have fun checking this out!

I could never think of a name for this game...
